This game is really good and all but my main problem is this fckin cooldown system. This is the main reason im quitting this game. My laptop is shit, sometimes it overheats and automatically shuts down in a middle of a comp and it takes me more than 5 mins to get back in the game cause its very slow and now i got another 7 day cooldown because  of this shit.
Fck this shit valve fix your shit ffs i put in too much fckin time in this game and now have to quit ive only been playing for 2 months and have 400 hours and its all going to wasted. thank you
i think its bullshit it is a free to play game, wtf i paid for this sheit when it first came out. i should have som kind of money back

Melhor shooter da vida. Desde 2002 jogando CS.
Agora com a nova atualização finalmente adicionaram skins, o que deixa o jogo mais interessante e um pouco mais atualizado.

This game is really good it can make many people have fun.
A sad thing is the toxic community but you can't change that.
If I was about to give a rate to this game it would be 5/5 Stars!

UPDATE:
I recently returned to the game and I saw so many new things.
I think this game is just getting better and better.

Playing this game, has a lot of ups and downs. The real down side generally, being put with SEA players who tend to only care about themselves. Multiple occasions where they would follow me till i die, to just get my rifle/awp off me, or even team kill for the sake of trolling. Playing this game, make sure you never solo queue as these SEA players are very toxic, and can kick you at, eg. 15-7 favouring your team. SEA honestly should not be mixed with Oceania Players. SEA, out of all games, in CSGO, the worse and least enjoyable to play with.
